idea-plugin.name: org.campagnelab.ANTLR
idea-plugin.description: ANTLR and org.campagnelab.antrl.tomps languages. The ToMPS language helps develop ANTLR-compatible visitors to parse text into nodes of an MPS language. ToMPS also provide support to create concepts of a new MPS language (whose nodes will be populated by the parser), using the ANTLR grammar as a guide. Note that version ${ANTLR_version} only includes the subset of ANTLR that we needed to model to implement the R language. Sadly, no documentation is available at this point and the language is unpolished. Reference build: ${build_number} in branch ${reference_branch} and with commit : ${reference_commit}.
